home.name: Amin Mohamed.
home.description: I am a dedicated software developer hailing from Germany, driven by a profound love for both the art of software engineering and the world of design. My heart beats in lines of code, and I perpetually seek fresh avenues to enhance my craft. With a focus on web development, I derive immense joy from crafting exquisite and practical websites that seamlessly blend form and function. Join me on my journey as I bring digital dreams to life, one line of code at a time
